events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of May 1st involving a rear-end collision with another vehicle.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident based on the description of damage to the vehicle and collision details provided.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case promptly to ensure smooth communication.
The customer was formally informed that their claim has been received and is now being processed by our claims department.
Requested the customer submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of the driverâ€™s license for verification.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including clear images of the car damage and the official accident report.
The investigation team began assessing the claim by reviewing documents and coordinating with the police department for details.
Investigation concluded finding the other party at fault; all vehicle damages verified and estimates prepared for repairs.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer covering all repair costs and rental car expenses during the repair period.
The customer responded expressing gratitude for the timely handling of the claim and the fairness of the proposed settlement.
Formal approval of the claim was granted by the claims manager following the customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
The payment for the repair costs was wired to the approved repair shop and rental car company as per the settlement agreement.
The claim case was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and the customer was satisfied with the outcome.
All claim documents, correspondences, and investigation reports were archived securely for future reference and compliance.
